sentences.en: There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
sentences.cn: 学校里有积压下来等待处理的维修和养护工作。

sentences.en: A number of people have been employed to deal with the backlog of work.
sentences.cn: 已雇来一些人处理积压的工作。

sentences.en: Today's economic slump could well generate a similar backlog of couples whose relationships have been irreparably ruined.
sentences.cn: 如今的经济衰退很可能会产生类似的情绪积压，导致夫妻关系被破坏，且难以弥补。
